Subject: Koto Japan
To: gillespie@...


Hello,Iam sorry that I don't have the information that you are looking
for,but I was wondering since you have traveled to Kyoto however that you
just might be able to give me some guidance.
   A few years ago I was given A beautiful Rin Gong or Singing bowl have
since learned that It is from the Tokugawa Shogunate.It is apparent from the
hollyhock mon,or family crest.There is one that is very similar to mine on
Wikipedia under singing bowl's. I was hoping that you had experienced the
purpose of the ceremony regarding the beautiful sound of the bowl.
    If you have any idea or maybe know of someone who does I would love to
know.I can send you a photo if you'd like.
            I Thank You so very much for your time and look forward to
hearing from you.
                         Once again Thank You,     Sincerely  Holly Lange
